ARABIC: إِنَّ لَكَ أَلَّا تَجُوعَ فِيهَا وَلَا تَعْرَىٰ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You will not go hungry in it or suffer from nakedness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Verily you will have no hunger or nakedness there,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (for in Paradise) neither are you hungry nor naked,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: In Paradise you will experience no hunger, nakedness,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Indeed for you in heaven is that you may never be hungry nor be unclothed.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: You will never be hungry therein nor naked."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely it is (ordained) for you that you shall not be hungry therein nor bare of clothing;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: It is assuredly given to thee neither to hunger therein, nor to go naked,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: It is (vouchsafed) unto thee that thou hungerest not therein nor art naked,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Here you shall not go hungry or be naked,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily it is thine that thou shalt not hunger therein nor go naked.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: You will neither be hungry in it nor naked.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: There is therein (enough provision) for thee not to go hungry nor to go naked,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, you have (a promise from Us) that you will never be hungry therein nor naked.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It has been given to you so that you shall neither become hungry nor naked therein;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In it you will never go hungry, nor be naked.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, it is [promised] for you not to be hungry therein or be unclothed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:118] It is indeed [assured] for you that you will neither be hungry therein nor go naked,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (It is (vouchsafed) unto thee that thou hungerest not therein) in Paradise (nor are naked,
